Kits.Name: Foundational Security Controls
Kits.Description: This kit deploys baseline security controls in the account - Amazon GuardDuty, AWS Config and AWS CloudTrail.

Kits.Name: WAF - Web Application Firewall Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys Protection against common application vulnerabilities or other unwanted traffic.
1. Protection from malicious traffic that increases resource consumption
2. Protection from XSS attacks
3. (Optional) Protection from bots and DDoS attacks
4. (Optional) Protection from SQL Injection attacks
5. Protection from PHP/WordPress attacks
6. Centralized WAF logging and monitoring

Kits.Name: Secure Storage Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 1 X S3 Bucket.
1. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)
2. Trend Micro Cloud One integrated with the Bucket

Kits.Name: Cloudwatch Bundle
Kits.Description: This kit deploys basic configuration and setup for cloudwatch dashboard. This creates a cloudwatch alarm to monitor cpu utilization that exceeds 70% for 5 minutes

Kits.Name: Palo Alto Firewall
Kits.Description: This kit deploys deploys a Palo Alto firewall with BYOL and DNS hostnames enabled

Kits.Name: Cost Management Foundations
Kits.Description: This stack creates an AWS Budget and budget alert in the target account.

Kits.Name: Git Repository
Kits.Description: This stack creates a private Git repository in the target account.

Kits.Name: Network Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 2 x Public Subnets in 2 Data centers.
2 x Private Subnets behind a Router with NAT Capabilities.
2 x Private Subnets with no exposure to the internet.
1 x Bastion Subnet.
1 x Bastion Host/Jump Server

Kits.Name: RedHat 8,9 and Custom Bundle - RHEL Virtual Machine bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys RedHat related AMIs version 8 or 9 by getting the latest amis sorted by latest creation date or you can input custom AMI Id from Redhat here.
The latest RHEL Image Id (BYOS or PAYG) - Please choose the latest Ami Id of RHEL image you want in that region. You can get the latest ami id from https://access.redhat.com/solutions/15356 Please follow the instructions at this site and get the image id from the region you want.

Kits.Name: Ubuntu Virtual Machine Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 1 x Virtual Machine (Ubuntu)
You can choose from 3 sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow RDP
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)

Kits.Name: Windows Virtual Machine Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 1 x Virtual Machine (Windows)
You can choose from 3 sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow RDP
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)

Kits.Name: Active Directory Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys new Active Directory Setup in AWS. It deploys 1 x Virtual Machine (Windows/Ubuntu)
You can choose from 3 sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow RDP
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)

Kits.Name: Active Directory Domain Controller Bundle
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys new Active Directory Domain Controller Setup in AWS. It deploys 1 x Virtual Machine (Windows/Ubuntu)
You can choose from 3 sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow RDP
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle).
3. ADDS roles and services configured and installed.
4. Automatically joined to your AD Domain

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Bundle - Windows and MSSQL Large
Kits.Description: This kit deploys WebApp Windows & MS SQL - large

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Bundle - Windows and MSSQL Medium
Kits.Description: This kit deploys WebApp Windows & MS SQL - Medium

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Bundle - Windows and MSSQL Small
Kits.Description: This kit deploys WebApp Windows & MS SQL - Small

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Ubuntu Bundle - Large
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Ubuntu large machine

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Ubuntu Bundle - Medium
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Ubuntu medium machine

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Ubuntu Bundle - Small
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Ubuntu Small machine

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Windows Bundle - Large
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Windows large machine

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Windows Bundle - Medium
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Windows medium machine

Kits.Name: Web Hosting Windows Bundle - Small
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Windows small machine

Kits.Name: Relational Database Bundle - MSSQL
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 1 x Managed Database Server (MSSQL).
You can choose from 3 database server sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow connection on the database
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)

Kits.Name: Relational Database Bundle - MYSQL
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 1 x Managed Database Server (MySQL).
You can choose from 3 database server sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow connection on the database
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)

Kits.Name: Relational Database Bundle - PostgreSQL
Kits.Description:
This kit deploys 1 x Managed Database Server (PostgreSQL).
You can choose from 3 database server sizes:
Small: 2vCPU’s, 4GB RAM, 50GB
Medium: 2vCPU’s, 8GB RAM, 50GB
Large: 2vCPU’s, 16GB RAM, 50GB
1. Pre-configured host based firewall to allow connection on the database
2. Deployable in existing networks in AWS or new networks (Network Bundle)

Kits.Name: Veeam Backup Bundle
Kits.Description: This kit deploys Veeam Backup for AWS Server

Kits.Name: Amazon Q for Business OneDrive Connector
Kits.Description: This stack creates and connects Amazon Q Business to your Microsoft OneDrive.
